attributes.action: Gemsfight- Lower the age of smear tests.
attributes.additional_details:
Although HPV can lay dormant in a persons body for years without any issues, it is also very common for problems to arise very quickly. 
From my own experience I was diagnosed with an aggressive form of stage 3 cervical cancer with no red flags from my previous smear. 
With lowering the age you will encourage women to turn up without the fear they will not be listened too. 
You will help save many lives. 
You will let children have more time with their mum. 
You will raise awareness.
attributes.background:
Sexually active women know their own body. 
Please consider lowering the age smear tests are available to us as well as every 2 years instead of 3. 
In order for us to feel somewhat ‘safe’ we need reassurance.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

Make Cervical Screening available to everyone from the age of 21
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580043

Offer free cervical screening test once a year to women age 25 to 60
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583601
